issuer.name: College of Professional Studies, Continuing Education
issuer.description: Designed by expert practitioners and delivered on your terms as a busy professional, our continuing education workshops will help you sharpen your skills. Tangible skills for today, not theory for tomorrow.

name: AI in Professional Practice
description: Earners of this badge explored the ethical and effective integration of AI across diverse professional contexts. They applied AI tools to boost creativity, enhance communication, and solve complex problems while critically evaluating AI outputs for quality, accuracy and context. Earners showcased ethical reasoning and adaptability, applying AI to support collaboration, writing, and innovation in the technical or non-technical domain of their choosing. Their skills reflect a strong foundation in navigating AI technologies to achieve meaningful and responsible outcomes.

criteria.narrative:
- Identify key considerations for responsible use of AI in professional practices. 
- Use AI tools and approaches to assist in refining and enhancing human communication and creative outputs tailored to diverse audiences and contexts. 
- Engage AI as co-intelligent partners in problem-solving processes. 
- Assess the quality, relevance, and reliability of AI outputs in either a technical or non-technical domain.
